title: Designing Multimedia Mathematics Instructional Methods Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Hands-on space utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops) and provision of basic multimedia editing tools

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more strategies for explaining mathematical concepts using multimedia materials (videos, interactive simulations, etc.)
The process of analyzing learner comprehension through formative assessments in blended learning environments can be performed with 90% accuracy
Learners can present five or more criteria for selecting learner-customized multimedia materials by applying metacognitive strategies

resources: Multimedia Content Template for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
